Class GooseController

java.lang.Object
org.tanzu.goose.cf.spring.GooseController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/goose") @ConditionalOnWebApplication(type=REACTIVE) @ConditionalOnClass(name="org.springframework.web.reactive.function.server.RouterFunction") @ConditionalOnProperty(name="goose.controller.enabled", havingValue="true", matchIfMissing=true) public class GooseController extends Object
REST controller for Goose CLI operations.

This controller provides HTTP endpoints for executing Goose commands:

  • POST /api/goose/execute - Execute a prompt and get the complete response
  • GET /api/goose/stream - Execute a prompt with streaming response (SSE)
  • GET /api/goose/health - Check if Goose CLI is available
  • GET /api/goose/version - Get Goose CLI version

Enable/Disable

This controller is automatically enabled when:

  • Spring WebFlux is on the classpath
  • Property goose.controller.enabled is true (default)
Since:
1.0.0
Author:
Goose Buildpack Team

      @GetMapping(value="/stream", produces="text/event-stream") public reactor.core.publisher.Flux<String> stream(@RequestParam String prompt)
      Execute a Goose prompt with streaming response (Server-Sent Events).

      prompt - the prompt to execute
      Returns:
